[Smoke]Error occur when previewed in PDF[00]
Build number:
2.2.0.v20070212-0630
Steps to reproduce:
1.new a report and insert some items to layout
2.preview in PDF/PostScript
Expected result:
Report items can be previewed 
Actual result:
Error occur:
Error log:
org.eclipse.birt.report.service.api.ReportServiceException: Error happened while running the report; nested exception is:
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: Error happened while running the report

Class CSSValue used in engine is not consistent with Class CSSValue used in PDF emitter.
Add the dependency on org.apache.xerces in Engine explicitly
